name: GTA V
short_description: Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond.
full_description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective. Players complete missions—linear scenarios with set objectives—to progress through the story. Outside of the missions, players may freely roam the open world.

name: Space Engineers
short_description: Space Engineers is an open world sandbox game based on creativity and exploration.
full_description: Players build spaceships, space stations, planetary outposts of various sizes and purposes, pilot ships and travel through space to explore planets and collect resources for survival. With creative and survival modes, there is no limit to what can be built, used and explored. Space Engineers features a realistic volume-based physics engine: everything in the game can be assembled, disassembled, damaged and destroyed.

name: Brotato
short_description: Brotato is an arena shooter with roguelike elements where you play as a weaponized potato fighting off hordes of aliens.
full_description: A spaceship from the planet Potato crashed in an alien world. Only Potato Brotato survived - a skilled fighter who can use up to 6 weapons at a time. The starchy warrior must survive in a hostile world and hold out until his comrades arrive.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
short_description: An open-world RPG where you play as Geralt, a monster hunter in search of his adopted daughter.
full_description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a story-driven open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
short_description: An open-world action-adventure game set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power and body modifications.
full_description: In Cyberpunk 2077, you play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

name: Minecraft
short_description: A sandbox game that lets players build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world.
full_description: Minecraft allows players to craft and build structures from textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world. Other activities include exploration, resource gathering, crafting, and combat.

name: Stardew Valley
short_description: A farming simulation game with elements of exploration, crafting, and relationships.
full_description: You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life.

name: Hades
short_description: A roguelike dungeon crawler where you play as Zagreus, the son of Hades, trying to escape the Underworld.
full_description: Hades combines the best aspects of Supergiant’s critically acclaimed titles to deliver a truly unique roguelike experience.

name: Elden Ring
short_description: An open-world action RPG created by FromSoftware in collaboration with George R.R. Martin.
full_description: Journey through the Lands Between in Elden Ring and create your path to power. Fight colossal enemies and unravel mysteries in this dark fantasy world.

name: Among Us
short_description: A multiplayer game where players work together to complete tasks while impostors try to sabotage them.
full_description: Play as a crewmate or an impostor on a spaceship in this social deduction game. Complete your tasks or deceive others to win.

name: Celeste
short_description: A platformer about climbing a mountain while facing personal challenges.
full_description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain in this challenging platformer.

name: Hollow Knight
short_description: An action-adventure game set in a vast interconnected world full of mysteries and challenges.
full_description: Explore the vast, ruined kingdom of Hallownest in Hollow Knight and uncover ancient secrets while battling fearsome foes.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
short_description: An epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland.
full_description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an open-world action-adventure game set in the late 1800s. Play as Arthur Morgan, an outlaw on the run.

name: Portal 2
short_description: A puzzle-platformer where you solve challenges using a portal gun.
full_description: Portal 2 is the sequel to the award-winning game Portal. Navigate through test chambers and unravel a humorous story.

name: DOOM Eternal
short_description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you battle demonic forces.
full_description: DOOM Eternal is the ultimate combination of speed and power, offering an intense and satisfying combat experience.

name: Terraria
short_description: An action-adventure sandbox game where you can explore, build, and fight.
full_description: Terraria offers a mix of classic action and sandbox gameplay. Dig, fight, explore, and build in a procedurally generated 2D world.

name: Subnautica
short_description: An underwater open-world survival adventure game.
full_description: Subnautica takes you to an alien ocean world where you must survive, build, and uncover secrets in the depths.

name: Factorio
short_description: A game about building and managing automated factories.
full_description: In Factorio, design and manage complex production chains while protecting your factories from alien threats.

name: Overcooked 2
short_description: A chaotic co-op cooking game where players work together to prepare and serve food under extreme conditions.
full_description: Overcooked 2 challenges you and your friends to work as a team to serve dishes in absurd and dynamic kitchens. With new recipes, chefs, and crazy challenges, it's a recipe for fun!

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
short_description: A challenging action-adventure game set in Sengoku-era Japan.
full_description: Play as a shinobi seeking revenge in a brutal and dark world. With intense combat and stealth mechanics, Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice offers an unforgettable experience.

name: Slay the Spire
short_description: A deck-building roguelike game where you battle your way through a mysterious spire.
full_description: Slay the Spire combines card games and roguelikes to create a unique experience. Craft a deck, face powerful foes, and uncover the secrets of the spire.

name: Valheim
short_description: A survival and exploration game inspired by Norse mythology.
full_description: Explore a vast procedurally-generated world as a fallen Viking warrior. Build shelters, craft tools, and battle ancient foes in Valheim.

name: Papers, Please
short_description: A dystopian document-checking simulator.
full_description: In Papers, Please, you play as an immigration officer in a fictional totalitarian state. Make tough decisions as you balance rules, bribes, and the well-being of your family.
